Text: Also, a special thanks to the original people who uploaded these seasons in .avi format. I wouldn't have been able to make this without your uploads!!! :)
Also, if am not wrong, the link for imdb is http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0386676/

Thanks Mac Genus. I didn't think imdb had pages for tv series, and probably wouldn't have even bothered to find it if I knew they did :)

Sorry for my painfully slow seeding, my connections is about 130 KB/s, and probably less for uploading data.
I can't get these to import into iTunes 10.5, any suggestions?

Not sure. Personally, I don't even touch iTunes. If you're not jailbroken, get CopyTrans manager as an alternative, should let you "sync" movies (and everything else) right onto your iPod, hassle-free. If you're jailbroken, find the MobileTheatre package on Cydia, install it, and then use a program like iPhone Explorer, Iexplorer, or iPhone Folders to put the video files in /var/mobile/library/downloads. Then you can watch them perfectly from MobileTheatre. That's the method I use.
